txt.en: 'Who awakens me? Is the time to crush Men at hand? You have summoned me with the collar promised. Wait....'
'Angmar's power will spread across Eriador once more.'
'You are not of Angmar. I can smell it in your blood. You will pay for this intrusion with your life!'
'You may have stopped my brothers, but your time comes to an end now.'
'Now, we begin.'
'We made it!'
'Those Uruks must be defeated if we are to escape!'
'Please come in, [placeholder]. I have been waiting for you.'
'Flee while you can!'
'To me!'
'Deal with these fools!'
'Arise, troll! Defeat the [placeholder]!'
'You see you are witnessing something hundreds of years in the making! Amarthiel has re-awakened us.'
'To the fight, my warriors!'
'You are too late, and now you will die!'
'Defeat the traitors!'
'Welcome. You have made it quite far, but now your journey has come to its end.'
'Greetings, intruders. You are a bit late for the festivities, but perhaps I can fill you in.'
'Wait...You are not here to help her, you are here to stop her! I will not allow this. I am sworn to protect her by the blade I fell upon...I will stop you!'
'Nothing here!'
'Prepare to make this your watery grave!'
'Perhaps you will provide a good meal for my hounds! Tûm, Mîgul, Ryk! Destroy them!'
'Let's try this door.'
'Quickly! Let us leave this haunted place!'
'Run! Now! She comes!'
'None shall escape the clutches of the champion of Angmar.'
'It is true, however, that you are trespassing on Angmar. For that, I think we will have a bit of fun. Boys, get them!'
'Fools! I will deal with you myself!'
'There is nothing you can do to stop her.'
'I'll rip you in half, [placeholder]!'
'There are others captive here. We should free them!'
'They are burning our idol! We must stop the infidels!'
'It seems you have taken down one of my brethren. Do you think to goad me into battle with your meagre show of strength?'
'Whelps! You have come far enough. This is the end for you!'
'I will then deal with you myself! You are beginning to annoy me!'
Hi!
You can not use this without first provoking Remmenaeg.
'You think to find Amarthiel here, do you? This keep belongs to us now.'
'I am impressed that you have made it this far. Impressed and enraged! You have foiled most of Amarthiel's plans in Fornost!'
'Welcome to Fornost, [placeholder]. Too bad that this is as far as you will go! The only redemption to be had will be mine!'
'Welcome to my lair, friends. I have had quite a few visitors recently....'
\qPen Door\q
